repo.title: Unlocked Dynamic Bible

release.name: Version 19-10
release.body:
This is version 19-10 of the English Unlocked Dynamic Bible. The versioning numbering system has first the year then the month of release.

Read the most current content on https://bibleineverylanguage.org/translations/.

See [v19-07..v19-10] (https://git.door43.org/WycliffeAssociates/en_udb/compare/1f08a181d05ffc288dce134cae936f7646ee0116...e4dbea552e83b3ba2fab0dee72b89d18944eca80) for a changelog since the previous release.
